items.summary: Ensure the brand name 'Parvati Pretty Lab' is displayed consistently and correctly across all locations in the site: the Header logo/wordmark, the HeroSection headline or overlay card, the Footer brand name, the browser tab title in frontend/index.html <title>, and any other component or page where the site name appears. Remove or correct any instances where the name is truncated, misspelled, or displayed in a different casing.
